title: Ticket #3879: python-bindings for ClassAds break with caching turned on
description:
Brian Bockelman said "Working on some new python binding tests, I noticed that the classad library breaks subtly when caching is turned on (which now is done by default in some circumstances)."

Patch file provided.
remarks: CODE REVIEW TJ looked this over and approved it.
check_ins: 2013-Aug-29 17:28   Check-in [37420]: Make python classad module deal with classad caching #3879 (By Tim Theisen )
creator: tim
